title: [FEATURE] Sign PDF with x509Certificate2
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Not really, It's related to a potential missing features.

<!-- A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I need to do X, but the API is missing from the C# binding. -->

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Nowadays I need to open Adobe Reader for digitally sign PDF Documents. Would be amazing if we can add x509Certificate2 signatures for PDF documents generated by SkDocument.CreatePdf().

<!-- A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. -->
Actually I didn't verified another way. I believe that using a new package just for this couldn't be good.

<!-- A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. -->

**Additional context**

<!-- Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here. -->

Thanks.
